column6: Seminar for Advanced Study of Education
column7: Seminar for graduate students on specific topics. 0 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours in the same term and a maximum of 12 hours in separate terms, if topics vary. Prerequisite: Admission to doctoral study.
